entry.title: Where do I start?
entry.summary: When asked about lacking areas in Bitcoin core, Mike Hearn suggests that it depends on the person's interests. He mentions that improving tests and documentation are always welcomed improvements. He recommends checking the issue tracker to get a feel for the highest priority tasks in Bitcoin Core. For those interested in more straightforward projects, he suggests looking into wallet apps. The email also includes an advertisement for BPM Camp, a virtual workshop for process modeling best practices with Bonita BPM.
